extendedInfo.description: Game description:Hi, my name is Edward, toy store boss in the small town.Everyone like to call me forgetful boy, because I always can't remember the location of toys.So that the customers complain about the waiting time is too long. I think it's time to find a assistant to help me.As long as someone tell me the location of the toys, I will with the fastest speed to get it.The game method:1. Click on a grid cabinet, forgetful boy will go to open it, and take the toys inside.2. If the toy is the customer wanted, pass the level.The game features:1. With the familiar with you to work, customers will be more and more.2. We can through the list who is working in the toy shop to earn the most.3. The resolution is equal to or greater than 800x480 is preferred.
